banner.title: WELCOME TO SCANWELL LOGISTICS VIETNAM
banner.description: Scanwell Logistics is one of the leading companies in the transport and freight forwarding industry. Scanwell offers a variety of transport and logistics solutions including international freight forwarding, domestic distribution, and supply chain logistics support. We transport goods quickly, safely, and on time worldwide.

about.title: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADE CO., LTD.
about.description: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADE CO., LTD. was established in 1981, with its headquarters located in Hong Kong. Over the past 35 years, we have grown to become one of the largest companies in the transport and freight forwarding industry, a fully trusted member of the IATA association. We have a network of branches across continents such as: America, Asia, Europe, Australia... and hundreds of agents in major cities worldwide, aiming to ensure the best conditions for controlling service quality and safety in the transportation of goods.

list.title: SEA TRANSPORT
list.description: Scanwell Logistics is one of the largest NVOCCs in Hong Kong, with over 30 years of experience in sea freight including LCL (Less than Container Load) and FCL (Full Container Load).

list.title: AIR FREIGHT
list.description: Scanwell Logistics is proud to be a member of the International Air Transport Association (IATA), with extensive experience in air freight services.

list.title: WAREHOUSE SERVICES
list.description: Currently operating service and bonded warehouses in central Ho Chi Minh City and surrounding areas such as Bien Hoa, Dong Nai, Nhon Trach, etc.

list.title: CUSTOMS SERVICES
list.description: With over 20 years of experience handling customs procedures in Vietnam.

list.title: DOMESTIC TRANSPORT
list.description: Scanwell Logistics is one of the largest NVOCCs in Hong Kong, with over 30 years of experience in sea freight including LCL (Less than Container Load) and FCL (Full Container Load). We have a network of small trucks and containers nationwide.

list.title: SORTING AND PACKING SERVICES
list.description: Scanwell is equipped with a comprehensive warehouse management system that can provide complete supply chain logistics solutions for our clients.

management.title: MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
management.subtitle: Streamline your business operations with our comprehensive management solution

waterTransport.title: Water Transport - KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED

sections.title: What are dangerous goods?
items: Dangerous goods are goods containing hazardous substances when transported by road or inland waterway that may cause harm to human life, health, the environment, safety and national security.
Hazardous substances are substances or compounds in gaseous, liquid or solid form that may cause harm to human life, health, the environment, safety and national security.

sections.title: Scanwell's dangerous goods transportation services:
items: Since its establishment, Scanwell has strived to provide the highest quality services to customers in the field of logistics for dangerous goods.

sections.content: Thanks to the agent network of Kim Hao Transport Trading Company Limited operating in more than 80 countries, we can meet all customer needs globally. All our agents are certified by IATA, FIATA for dangerous goods transportation operations in their respective countries and regions. Therefore, Kim Hao Transport Trading Company Limited is confident to provide dangerous goods transportation services from Vietnam to countries around the world and vice versa with safety and full compliance with local requirements worldwide.

content.intro: Express delivery service, hand-carried service for urgent shipments.
content.description: Hand-carried luggage - Express delivery by air is a service provided by Scanwell with a special team and quick procedures to literally HAND-CARRY your goods onto the plane...
features: Same day or next day delivery depending on destination
